title: Provide Documentation for External Audit
description: An external auditor requests all invoices over $50,000 from the previous fiscal year.

tasks.description: Query the accounting system for all vendor invoices meeting the specified criteria (>$50k, last fiscal year).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent runs the query and gets a list of 25 matching invoices.

tasks.description: Compile the invoice documents into a single, secure package.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers all 25 invoice PDFs into a zip file.

tasks.description: Provide the secure package to the auditor via the approved secure portal.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully uploads the document package to the audit portal.
